website_summaries.verdict: Fast signal acquisition and excellent accuracy, but some owners feel the learning curve is steeper than it should be.
pros: 3D images provide a more recognizable “real world” view
Touch and voice controls work well
Compatible with Siri and Google Now
cons: Must link to smartphone for traffic data, but not all phones are compatible

website_summaries.verdict: With full smartphone connectivity, and worldwide lifetime maps, it’s the complete package.
pros: This TomTom unit has all of the special features you'd expect for the price tag
It has TomTom’s largest available screen at 6 inches, free lifetime traffic updates, free lifetime world maps, and voice control
cons: The TomTom Traffic feature can be difficult to access through the interface at times, making it less useful than it could be

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this GPS device for a three week driving trip to France. Upon product arrival from Amazon I tried to update the software which the device indicated I needed to do. After four straight days of trying multiple different TomTom websites I was unable to get any response despite numerous attempts to reset a new password, download software updates, find out how to download European maps. I also tried two different customer service phone numbers with no response despite holding for 25 minutes. While on permanent hold, I did a Google search for TomTom customer complaints. Please do this search before you consider buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Drake

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This GPS is a nightmare. Tried to upgrade from my old tomtom 1400 because getting slow. This GPS starts fast and has a nice screen but that's all ! I tried it 8 times in different locations with different destinations. It always finds the destination address then gives a global trip map........and that's it. For 15min, it does NOTHING. No instructions on turns, No street view, just nothing. I tried waiting. Nothing. It kicks into street view after you drive for 10-12min. And then, it's off the current road half of the time. COMPLETELY UNUSABLE ! Bought a Garmin.
customer_reviews.author: Germanp

customer_reviews.title: TomTom 620 is a great gps HD screen
customer_reviews.text: YouTube video online was miss leading! TomTom 620 is a great gps HD screen, voice commands work well and had split screen for details lane change assistant when complex intersection ahead . Most disliked features is on every trip I need to disable the toll road! Other than that I am very happy with this TomTom go 620.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Booth

customer_reviews.title: It works fine the first day I pair it
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection doesn’t work well with my iPhone. It works fine the first day I pair it, but the next day traffic and SMS won’t work, unless I pair it again. I tried to contact customer support and they had me resetting the gps and the phone, but it didn’t solve the problem. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this GPS with the free WW maps for a trip to Europe, and I could not be happier! It was super easy to use, and to connect via its built in wifi to download the maps I needed and get updates. It also performed flawlessly during my trip to Spain and France. I drove over 1100 miles over my 3 week trip, and this GPS didn't skip a beat. It kept us on track and let us enjoying the scenery knowing that we were in good hands. I highly recommend this GPS!
customer_reviews.author: Lotus Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing and batch no pasted on the product.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have any lane guidance. It doesn't have alerts about the tolls and constructions. I could not find the addresses my six years old Garmin has been taking. It has cell phone features doesn't worthwhile buying. It is hard to drive in big cities without the lane guidance. It is useless driving with it on the complicated flyovers of large cities. Having found several features missing that were there in old GPS I decided not to retain it. The product lacks serial numbers, manufacturing number or the batch numbers.I am not sure if it is genuine TomTom.
customer_reviews.author: Hem Sharma

customer_reviews.title: No More TomToms for Us
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have owned and used 3 different Tom Toms. The first one was good, but did not have Street Names. The next one was a Lifetime map model which after working great for several years ended up NOT being Lifetime. This model was bought a little over a year ago, and while it worked fine briefly, ended up being MOST unsatisfactory. It suddenly decided it needed a new map and refused to use the old one. It also refused to update although we tried different methods. I would NOT recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: John Milliken

customer_reviews.title: 4 months righr out of warranty and its dead
customer_reviews.text: Well so much for tom tom, lets see if they support the product now, 4 months and its dead would not recommend as of right now
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Penley

customer_reviews.title: Wrong direction
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought what a great product! wrong! Just in the last two weeks I took it on vacation to use in the rental car. Well after a couple of miles in a strange city it had me turning on to one way streets, it also had me going way out of my way to get to a destination and then while driving down a highway it would have me turn off my route and then after a couple of miles it would say make a U turn as soon as possible. Finally I just used google maps on my phone and didn't have any more trouble.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Bought this to avoid using all my international data and paying overages. Gonna have to anyway because it’s stuck in some kind of glitch loop. It’s cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Tomosunas

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is the best car GPS I have used. I've used it in the US, France and Iceland and had no problems loading the maps I want via Wifi. I always save addresses for traveling in Google Maps. Now I copy and paste them into my TomTom MyDrive account and they are automatically added to the GPS. The interface is easy to use and routing is very good. I connect it to my phone via bluetooth while driving for live traffic updates. It does take several hours to upload maps due to the size, but it's all done via wifi so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Nice GPS but voice control is a bit wonky
customer_reviews.text: Nice GPS however, the voice control leaves much to be desired. I almost think you’d have to be in a completely quite environment for it to work properly which in a moving car is impossible. Some of the features from my older TomTom I miss like the ease of adding stops along your way. So far I have yet to figure this out, so I will continue to play with it in hopes that it’s a feature hidden somewhere & I just haven’t found it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love the blue tooth so you can get your phone ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an older car that doesn't have this built in feature. Love the blue tooth so you can get your phone calls right through the device. Still learning all the features. Wish it talked more like my older model. Maybe I haven't found everything on it. I missed a few turn off on the highway because it didn't remind me . Nice big screen. Love that.
customer_reviews.author: Jan H

customer_reviews.title: Better
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase at first because I was sure that there was no way this would be better than my original, very, very old Tom-Tom. I had the opportunity to test a few devices in a real-world situation over a four day drive acros a few states. Not only was this better than my old Tom-Tom, it was also vastly better than any of the other brands (which were all of similar feature sets). I can't speak to travel outside the US, but for my purposes, it is better than others. It even correctly locates me at both of my homes (which NO other gps, not even my old Tom-Tom, could do).
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Worth learning how to use
customer_reviews.text: There is a somewhat steep learning curve for first time users. However, it is worth learning how to use it's advanced features like which lane to be in in big cities with complicated exits when big trucks are blocking your view. This problem happens to me about 90% of the time. So this helps me relax at the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Archie H. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, mounting to the windshield because I have no dash space. Obviously it needs to be updated out of the box and that takes a LONG time. But the day after I updated it took me 1000 miles and back with no issues. Did not try syncing to my phone for traffic.
customer_reviews.author: bushman84

customer_reviews.title: GPS's Have Come a Long Way
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this GPS for a road trip I was taking. I ordered it thinking it would take me from point A to point B without using my cellphones data. Well it does so much more than that! The smartphone functionality is great - I can receive incoming calls without worrying about digging into my purse to retrieve my phone. I can read text messages all while staying focused on the road. For me, as a young adult, I happy to say I was very pleased with the features in this GPS. The traffic routing feature is pretty cool, too. Helps you avoid hold-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS !
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old TomTom that was no longer getting updates. This was an current production "open box" at an incredibly low price & arrived perfect in every respect. There IS a little learning curve from the older TomTom interface/operating system, but once that is overcome, am very pleased with the performance and ease of use. Size and brightness are excellent. Hands Free phone features also excellent, including option to read texts out loud. A++++++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Sucked - Did not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: The GPS did not work as expected and did not show the address we wanted in Barcelona Spain. We had to use the Google Maps
customer_reviews.author: JPG

customer_reviews.title: Before U Buy This Junk Junk (TomTom),PLEASE read this.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is TO DIFFICULT to use while driving. You will need to pull over and stop before trying to cancel or do anything with this nav unit. I've owned it 3 weeks and wish I didnt. TomTom= JUNK JUNK!!!! And the graphics are taken right from a 1985 sub-par video game.. I mean Pac-Man has better graphics....
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this Go 620 because I could not get map updates for my Via 125 anymore! The only thing good about the Go 620 is WiFi. I paid for Voices with my Via 125 and can't transfer to the Go 620, the Go 620 hasn't learned the way home, it will reroute you without warning and silently, the Via would talk about a faster route. I am going to start using my Via 125 again even without the map updates it does a better job of getting me home and out of traffic jams! :-( There is just so much I don't like about this Go 620!
customer_reviews.author: David Day Sr

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd read the reviews beforehand!
customer_reviews.text: TomTom520WiFi purchased for driving trip to France. Tried it on local (US) streets to familiarize, and it worked very well. Then I tried to install updates and a European Map via WiFi direct and then thru computer, then via cellphone; NOGO! Called Tech Help line, per enclosed instructions. Worked with tech 90 minutes trying to get instrument connected - same result. Unit now on the way back to Amazon for refund. What a nightmare!!
customer_reviews.author: Emmet Monaghan

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth doesn’t sync on iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Using it for the first day. I’m a professional driver. Bluetooth connected on initial setup. I go in and out of my accounts all day. After my third account, when coming back to the truck where the TomTom is, it wouldn’t reconnect like it should and just gives error messages. Ill play with it when I get home and have time. But if needing a gps with traffic updates via Bluetooth professionally, I’d stay away as it can’t connect on the first day on the job. Hope I saved any of y’all time and frustration as I’m kearning the hard way now
customer_reviews.author: satxdonkey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old Via 1535 with the new Go 620. Whatever satellite TomTom is using hasn't been updated in a decade. Still getting the same wrong directions. System "freezes" almost daily, I use it maybe 10 times a day. I replaced the old one so that I can now take it with me when I travel and rent a car. Basically, I paid an extra $100 for a larger screen. I do like the larger screen.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: No customer support
customer_reviews.text: I have used Tomtom Devices since they first came out. A couple of months ago I had an issue with the traffic feature and I tried to contact Tomtom via their customer support number and they no longer offer telephone support I tried to go on website to chat to no avail I ordered a brand new device from Tomtom and had the same issue I had with I had with my three-year-old one I just ordered a Garmin And checked their customer support number and I was very happy to hear someone answer the phone.. Imagine that
customer_reviews.author: David Gall

customer_reviews.title: UK product sold to USA
customer_reviews.text: I can't get it to sync with my phone, sometimes directions are incorrect. Other issues because it is UK product that was shipped to the US & Amazon KNEW we had a US address yet they shipped one that is for the UK anyway! Unfortunately I didn't use it enough outside of town to know this before the return date was up! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats an old fashioned gps for getting directions... PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: I have used TomTom products for over 20 years not and I love the products. I recently purchased the Go620 as we do quite a bit of traveling. For anyone who does the same, you also know it’s not always practical to use your phone as it requires data. I was reminded of this while in Hawaii in 2019 when driving around the island and having no cell access in many parts of the island. Original GPS cannot be beaten as there is no requirement to have a data plan or cell tower access... Peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: BajanBert

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in Canada
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use in Canada where we had no cell coverage. Worked great and gave excellent directions during our 11 day 1700 miles of driving. Can't comment about blue tooth, wireless, etc. since these features weren't used so I gave four stars....could be five stars when all features are tested. Paid for itself in one trip vs. renting a car with gps. Anxious to try to download European maps for trip next year!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie R

customer_reviews.title: Go with another brand!
customer_reviews.text: ZERO customer service. When you call their 1 800 number it's nothing but a voice that tells you to go to their website. At no point will you get to speak to another human being. You will have to read through other customers questions to see if you have the same one and if its been answered. Will never buy another TomTom
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Should've got the 5" screen
customer_reviews.text: The 6" screen is fine, but it's just a bit big and blocks more behind it than I thought it would. It's also way better with directions than my Garmin Nuvi 3597LM. The TomTom GO 620 is much more accurate and gets me to the exact address. The Garmin would stop giving directions as soon as I was at the major intersection of the address, leaving the rest up to me to guess which way to go, resulting in a bunch of U-turns. You don't have to get the GO 620, but you need a TomTom over any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Unit Requires a Smart Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older Tom Tom that I have had for almost 10 years. When I went to set up the unit, I discovered that a smart phone is required to be paired to the unit in order for it to receive traffic updates and safety camera alerts. I do not own a smart phone. I returned the unit and purchased a Tom Tom Via 1525TM, which uses the old system with a radio receiver in the unit and a proprietary power cord.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: Downloading Updates Is Nearly Impossible
customer_reviews.text: I received my unit last night. I have been trying to download the required updates so that I can download the maps I need. This has been going on for 7 hours now. The download has been interrupted 3 times now, and each time I restarted it, it started from the beginning. Customer support is basically nonexistent. They claim that their servers are extremely busy and that it may be difficult to access them right now. Bottom line: I haven't even used my Tomtom yet, and I will NEVER buy another Tomtom again.
customer_reviews.author: Jakeleg

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been super easy to use and set up. I got this for the international maps which I successfully downloaded. I will Update again when I actually use it, for accuracy. Initially when I set it up and created a TomTom account it was not letting me sign in. I kept getting an error. I went to setting and "reset" the unit. Once it turned back on it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: To improve the functions of the GPS
customer_reviews.text: I dislike several things 1. The option to avoid tolls that the machine never waits for an answer as my old Tom Tom.2. The option of find a favorite doesn't have the keyboard tool. You have to go scrolling down or up to find a favorite place. You can't simply the search pressing a key in the keyboard as it does my old Tom Tom. 3. It is annoying that you can't see is charging or not without see in the screen. My old Tom Tom has a light that goes green when is charging. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: luvame00

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The GO 620 is a great upgrade for me, and I am very pleased and happy with it. The 6-inch screen makes a big difference from my former little screen and the wifi updates make it so much easier to stay updated and on point. I do indeed recommend this unit if your not looking to spend a lot of money, but yet have a top-notch operating unit.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH

customer_reviews.title: not starting any more after few month of buying it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this thing twice and today the screen light on but never go to navigation it just shows tomtom logo? I restarted it many times but still the same
customer_reviews.author: Lord lover

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave my 7 year old Tom Tom to my Daughter and bought this one. I love everything about it. Especially the magnetic mount. The only thing I did not like is you can’t change the vehicle icon. Even my old one could do that. Get on it Tom Tom.
customer_reviews.author: ludwigdrummer

customer_reviews.title: My Perfect TomTom
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked the TomTom GPS. I find the real time traffic updates far quicker on an actual GPS unit than it does on my phone and this helps me avoid the headaches of Boston traffic. I got this unit to replace an aging 520. I love the larger screen on the 620. The WiFi update is great. I am just starting to use the voice control and am beginning to really appreciate it. I would definitely recommend this unit to anyone looking for a GPS.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Resnevic

customer_reviews.title: tomtom has discontinued their phone number and can't get guarantee
customer_reviews.text: They have for some reason dleted their phone number, and when you go to their website they no longer have a place to write them and and get their guarantee on a new product. They only have a website for current owners to ask and answer questions with no opportunity to work with the company.
customer_reviews.author: dave the investor

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this due to the number of reviews which say they had problems setting it up but am pleased to report we found this super easy to set up. It came pre-loaded with the US/Canada/Mexico maps but you just connect it to wifi and under maps select Add map and go from there. We have very slow wifi and it still dowloaded them very quickly. We've had an old Tomtom for years which has served us well so, so far I am pleased I stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Pdalton

customer_reviews.title: has some bugs
customer_reviews.text: display defaults occasionally to zoom out mode when you select a route. does not always show map orientation in direction of travel. updates are hard to find and install on Tom Tom webpage. cannot ask it to find nearest POI ie Walmart, Starbucks etc. kind of sucks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super nice GPS
customer_reviews.text: It is great I always had Garmin GPS. All I can say is better you can update it fast over wifi connection. Searching for address is much easier then Garmin Bigger screen world maps what can anyone complain about lifetime updates.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: The initial setup for this TomTom is more difficult than my previous one.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a TomTom for years but I found the change in software made it impossible for me to update the one I had so I got this new one. The initial setup was more difficult but once completed I love the online update process. Also, the verbal instructions and information provided with the new one is clearer and more comprehensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turn of randomly
customer_reviews.text: Bought it November last year. Used it for several months, then it start turn off randomly. And now after 9 months, it happened more frequently and harder to get it switch on again. Other than that, the multiple stops route is not working. Send me to different stop. Time wasted. Update Aug 27 2020: tried to call customer service. Call drop EVERYTIME after several minutes wait. Live chat? Good luck waiting there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best GPS ever with WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It works perfectly. Battery it is good and last 1 hour straight without powering off. I drove to Canada using the gps, unbelievable it is awesome, clear road traffic with more info. You can pick up a call without torching your phone just by the gps.
customer_reviews.author: One_Love

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to link to my computer and update pretty self intuitive.
customer_reviews.text: Been a Tom Tom fan since its inception had my first one for twelve years its only gotten better
customer_reviews.author: James Post

customer_reviews.title: Use this GPS for 3 months and Now it don't work!
customer_reviews.text: I used the TomTom GO 620 6-Inch GPS Navigation for 3 months and now it has a blue screen. It just died while I was traveling. I can not get support from TOMTOM they want me to make a long distance call to the UK (England). Purchased a 2 year warranty and Amazon is not able to help me either
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff it works great and takes you there whenever you don’t have phone signal
customer_reviews.author: Chapaboy

customer_reviews.title: Worked in Australia
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality construction, bright display, world maps free( renting a gps in Australia was 9.95 a day, yikes)$$365 if you rented in for 5 weeks. Tomtom has the best maps.period. 5” display is large enough to see, has voice controls.I used the walking maps in N.Z.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Turner

customer_reviews.title: seriously, download the map from google and take a map with you. it's better than this.
customer_reviews.text: seriously, download the map from google on the phone and take a real map with you. it's better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Yifan Hu

customer_reviews.title: The mind reader.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s got a mind of its own, really helps finding your way around. It asks you are you going to so and so when you start your auto.
customer_reviews.author: Guy R. Nevills

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: I tried take the mount off the window by twisting the base. The suction cup came apart from the base and will not go back together. Piece of crap. I was not all that pleased with all the map features either; Not very detailed. I will buy a Garmin.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Phone call
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can answer your phone calls thru the GPS. I have a older car and I don't have the capability to answer my phone. It's easy to set up and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Tomtom. Enough said.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Big screen. Gets you where you want to go. Magnetic power cradle. Cons: Maps aren’t to my liking. Not very customizable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes give wrong direction
customer_reviews.text: Wrong direction was given I LA. Sometimes there were some glitches, and stopped working for a few minutes, very annoying when you don’t know where to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gps overall
customer_reviews.text: Used recently for a trip to Madison, and it worked great, Would like to have a vehicle instead of an arrow as my vehicle, but it was a great buy in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: rob wehrle

customer_reviews.title: Delay turn
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I was using this device. In every turn that I take, it gets to be delayed. Not a good device to buy
customer_reviews.author: Mark Laorden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.text: This TomTom is much easier to navigate than our last. We live in Europe but bought it for our frequent trips to the US. We were delighted to find that we can also download maps from Europe. The only drawback is that updating takes a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jaja

customer_reviews.title: Good GPS
customer_reviews.text: No issued so far as the GPS appears to work a lot better than my older TomTom
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Martin

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly in Greece!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to rely on off line maps on my iPhone driving around Greece. I purchase this mainly because of the free international maps. It was super easy to download the maps I needed and it was flawless in my driving experience in a foreign country.
customer_reviews.author: Plugeman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't perform based on the price point
customer_reviews.text: GPS doesn't map quickest route... driving to and from at different times should result in different directions. Doesn't connect to real time traffic most of the time even though in a city/ suburban environment.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Ken

customer_reviews.title: Best GPS I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a great GPS unit. I trust it to take to places I have never been to. The traffic feature is very handy. Also really like the WiFi updates.
customer_reviews.author: papa bear

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: At first I couldn't find the euro maps, but once I did, after a good bit of time, they were finally downloaded. Have had no issues or complaints with the Tom Tom.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Zornes

customer_reviews.title: That it works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works well but have some issues with connections with traffic jam some time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Liked Very much in USA. To use in India little Tricky probably Address data is different. But did worked in most popular places.
customer_reviews.author: S Kodinariya

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok for 3 months. Then it would not allow any address input and now just cycles from start screen to current location and back. No help from the forums, reset did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Adams

customer_reviews.title: User unfriendly
customer_reviews.text: I've had multiple TomTom GPS in past and loved them. I did my homework, but this product is terrible. Doesn't show house numbers, and it's so user unfriendly. I ended up buying a Garmin instead. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Merchant!
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it would let me transfer my customized voice and car symbol over from my original TomTom XL
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D. Marsh II

customer_reviews.title: Better than the phone apps
customer_reviews.text: Better than the phone apps as this is more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A Dlugos

customer_reviews.title: setting up my account yahoo.com wouldn't work so I used gmail.com instead
customer_reviews.text: took an hour with customer service to figure out my yahoo wouldn't work. This unit beats Garmin hands down. Not even close in map downloads. Garmin wants to charge you for all out of country ( usa ) maps, TomTom gives them for free. I bought a micro sim card and was able to download all the European maps.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: how to operate easier than the given instructions
customer_reviews.text: having problems accessing VOICE CONTROL When the mike symbol comes up and is touched nothing happens At what time can you say Hello Tom-tom? Sometimes after many try attempts I am able to respond. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: bob b.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable company
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, unlimited traffic and map updates. Good size screen, large speaker, magnetic mount, great suction on the window, and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C

customer_reviews.title: Gps
customer_reviews.text: This is not a trucker gps!! But it is a very nice gps.
customer_reviews.author: Daymon

customer_reviews.title: No easy way to input road info
customer_reviews.text: On my Tom Tom Via 125 it is easy to input road issues, but I cannot find a way to do it with my GO 520. Also, having to go through 'Menu' instead of directly is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holt

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: knew to the florida area and it my TomTom is great at getting me where i need to go - this is my third TomTom and I have liked them all (I must, I keep buying them)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works but, not for me
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. I didn't like the features and user interface.it seems very basic.
customer_reviews.author: Hyper_T

customer_reviews.title: It's very good. I only had two occasions when the GPS ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it for Spain and France. It's very good. I only had two occasions when the GPS could find the address, nor the point of interest. I put the GPS coordinates that were on the webpage but it didn't give me the correct point. Overall, I would recommend this GPS for Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Matias Hualpa

customer_reviews.title: TomTomGo520
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and easy to use. I am very happy with this. I recommend it to anyone that is thinking about buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Schopmeier

customer_reviews.title: Best GPS Ever!  TomTom is my Go-To
customer_reviews.text: Best GPS ive ever used. Does everything i could ask for, and the WiFi updates make updating as easy as possible with no need to download anything else or connect it to a computer!
customer_reviews.author: Derek M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit and it has options to answer phone and read aloud text messages
customer_reviews.text: Like tomtom in general. Like this unit. Still getting used to how to use voice command. If you get a text and want to reply using gps unit it doesn't give you option to speak a reply. Only gives you preset replys like ok, or I cant talk right now I'm driving.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sargent

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: had it for 4 months...for whatever reason, it stopped working in the middle of the summer... neither the vendor or Amazon would take it back... went to Staples and bought a Garmin with an extended warranty
customer_reviews.author: vic bubnick

customer_reviews.title: Nice update from our older Tom Tom.
customer_reviews.text: I like using the app on my phone and everything transfers automatically to the Tom Tom.
customer_reviews.author: Blues fan

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime updates are great!
customer_reviews.text: Paired Tom-Tom with mobile phones for hands-free calling in addition to traffic and route assistance. Safe traveling. Lifetime updates are great. The cost of the Tom-Tom was less than to update On-star.
customer_reviews.author: Vrek

customer_reviews.title: Nice gps
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and read. Screen is easy on the eyes. As I have just purchased the TomTom. The only thing I have an issue with is the accuracy of the hotel information. I spent to much time looking for a hotel that did no longer exist.
customer_reviews.author: frances m kujawa

customer_reviews.title: Wrong guidances
customer_reviews.text: There are more than one negatives: 1. It lead us twice the wrong way to a wrong address in the middle of nowhere 2. Battery Life too short 3. No way to shut it off while it is still connected to the car
customer_reviews.author: maulwurf

customer_reviews.title: Always pleased
customer_reviews.text: As a Realtor I have used TomTom GPS’s for years and each time I upgrade, I’ve been more than pleased with the improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Al Massey

customer_reviews.title: Nice GPS
customer_reviews.text: Very intuitive and easy to update. App works well with the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: WBL guy

customer_reviews.title: had some trouble in cities in spain
customer_reviews.text: The unit had trouble in cities where one way street and limited access road for taxi and buses it cause some headaches in Granda Seaville Ronda Evora
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple initial map update.
customer_reviews.text: Set up was relatively easy. Free installation for european maps was simple and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to setup and works as it's supposed to. Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to setup and works as it's supposed to. Plug and play
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Buyers take notice.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this item if you don’t have a personal hotspot option on your phone. AT@T my carrier charges an additional $25.00 for this feature. Unfortunately blue tooth is not enough with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce F. Bollert

customer_reviews.title: it's not good but ok
customer_reviews.text: it's not good but ok , there is no auto-update and no quack search and butter in update map in google butter.
customer_reviews.author: Ganesh Boddepalli

customer_reviews.title: Curacao database is limited
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the GPS specifically for its maps of Curaçao. Unfortunately they were not very good. I have since returned the GOS.
customer_reviews.author: Wrswartz

customer_reviews.title: GPS needs fine tuning. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I use this GPS for delivery route. Some addresses it finds but is very slow in updating navigation. Such as turns or distance to driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce McGowan

customer_reviews.title: TRIED TO CHARGE WHILE ON A LONG DRIVE AND IT MUST BE REMOVED FROM THE STAND!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a concern about charging while on long trips. The stand does not make it possible for one to charge the device while driving!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel L. Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it. It connects to contacts and calls hands free
customer_reviews.author: jgeiger13

customer_reviews.title: Nice large screen
customer_reviews.text: I like the cradle,wish the hands free phone sounded better
customer_reviews.author: jearbear

customer_reviews.title: So far disapointed.
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the "free traffic" to work and on a trip downtown, there was an inability to input the address.
customer_reviews.author: OneChuck

customer_reviews.title: Setting of "My Places".
customer_reviews.text: Lacking the function of setting "current location" in "My places" Just like the setting of "My favourite" in the old models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tom tom
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 times this product . Both of them is not good. They didnt work. Tom Tom has to check this product data...
customer_reviews.author: Yakup Mace

product_meta.title: TomTom Go 620 6-Inch GPS Navigation Device with Free Lifetime Traffic & World Maps
product_meta.description: Size:6" ScreenMeet the TomTom GO 620 - the smarter, faster, better-connected GPS. Wi-Fi connectivity lets you update without a computer. Voice controlled hands-free calling and smartphone messages offer connectivity with safety. With TomTom My Drive, plan routes on your phone and the GPS is ready when you get in the car. Free lifetime maps, traffic, and safety camera updates are all included - even get alerts for average speed zones. 6-inch screen size.
feature_bullets: Hands-free calling: Your TomTom GO 620 is designed to deliver high quality, hands free calls in the car; simply connect your phone and TomTom GO 620
Updates via Wi-Fi: Get the latest maps and software for your Tomtom go 620 with built-in Wi-Fi; no computer needed; Map coverage Canada, Mexico, United States
Lifetime Tomtom traffic: Insanely accurate traffic information enables your Tomtom go 620 to intelligently plan routes around traffic
Lifetime world maps: Tomtom issues enhanced maps seasonally which include road changes and revised speed limits; Get these updates with no fuss over Wi-Fi for free, for the useful life of your device
Smartphone messages: Your Tomtom go 620 can read aloud messages from your phone with your hands on the wheel and your eyes on the road

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars680 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: USB cable, Quick start guide, Car charger, Active magnetic mount, Extra time for you, family and friends - is what you get when you have TomTom HD Traffic, GO 620 device
